backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing news items with publish, remove, and fetch operations using a list store and mixin-based blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three NewsPage-related UI workflow features, their affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app into the root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and React Query provider, wiring layout and pages including NewsPage.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with Swift Energy branding, attribution, and CK Education tagline.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with logo and navigation links, including mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/ImageSlider.tsx: Auto‑advancing image carousel with hover‑pause, gradient overlays, and navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: App shell providing header, footer, and routed page content via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor tied to Internet Identity, handling access control initialization and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Authentication context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useNews.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching, publishing, and removing news via an actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing for unused backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus global styles and a grid background pattern.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with an image slider, team mission sections, and member bios.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Implements the History page with an image slider and a timeline of team milestones.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the Home page featuring a hero banner, team intro, and core values section.
frontend/src/pages/InnovationsPage.tsx: Displays the Innovations page with a slider and detailed cards describing team innovation projects.
frontend/src/pages/newsManagementFlow.ts: Defines the state machine, actions, and reducer used to manage the PIN → options → add/remove news flow.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Implements the News page UI with image slider, PIN-gated add/remove news flow, and handlers for publishing and removing news items.
frontend/src/utils/newsDate.ts: Validates month/day/year inputs and converts them to a bigint nanosecond timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata describing requirements and issues for reworking the NewsPage '+' button and PIN/options flow.
